languages.text: "Из обсерватории Эурак-V я часто наблюдала за тюремным поселением на небольшом планетоиде. Глядя на это небесное тело, я начинаю думать, что все подобные образования похожи друг на друга".

traits.locale_text: "Из обсерватории Эурак-V я часто наблюдала за тюремным поселением на небольшом планетоиде. Глядя на это небесное тело, я начинаю думать, что все подобные образования похожи друг на друга".

languages.text: "I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."
languages.original_text: "Из обсерватории Эурак-V я часто наблюдала за тюремным поселением на небольшом планетоиде. Глядя на это небесное тело, я начинаю думать, что все подобные образования похожи друг на друга".

traits.locale_text: "I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac-V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."
"I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac-V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."
"I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac-V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."
"I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."

languages.text: « Depuis l'observatoire d'Eurac-V, je scrutais souvent la population incarcérée sur un petit planétoïde. En regardant ce corps céleste aujourd'hui, je commence à me dire que toutes les entités de ce genre se ressemblent. »
languages.original_text: "I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."

traits.locale_text: « Depuis l'observatoire d'Eurac-V, je scrutais souvent la population incarcérée sur un petit planétoïde. En regardant ce corps céleste aujourd'hui, je commence à me dire que toutes les entités de ce genre se ressemblent. »

languages.text: “我过去常常从欧拉克五号星站的天文台上，观察周围小行星上囚犯。看着眼前的天体，我突然感觉，天底下果然没有新鲜事。”
languages.original_text: "I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."

traits.locale_text: “我过去常常从欧拉克五号星的天文台上，观察周围小行星上囚犯。看着眼前的天体，我突然感觉，天底下果然没有新鲜事。”

languages.text: 「ユーラックVの天文台から、小さな小惑星の囚人たちをよく眺めていたわ。今この天体を見ると、このような天体は、すべて似たようなものであると思えてきたの」
languages.original_text: "I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."

traits.locale_text: 「ユーラックVの天文台から、小さな小惑星の囚人たちをよく眺めていたわ。今この天体を見ると、このような天体は、すべて似たようなものであると思えてきたの」

languages.text: "Ich habe vom Observatorium auf Eurac V aus oft die Gefangenen auf einem kleinen Planetoiden beobachtet. Wenn ich mir diesen Himmelskörper nun ansehe, glaube ich langsam, dass alle solche Orte ähnlich sind."
languages.original_text: "I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe vom Observatorium auf Eurac V aus oft die Gefangenen auf einem kleinen Planetoiden beobachtet. Wenn ich mir diesen Himmelskörper nun ansehe, glaube ich langsam, dass alle solche Orte ähnlich sind."

languages.text: «A menudo observaba a la población de presos de un pequeño planetoide desde el observatorio de Eurac V. Al ver este cuerpo celestial, empiezo a pensar que son todos iguales».
languages.original_text: "I would often watch the prison population on a small planetoid from Eurac V's observatory. Looking at this celestial body now, I am beginning to think that all such entities are alike."

traits.locale_text: «A menudo observaba a la población de presos de un pequeño planetoide desde el observatorio de Eurac V. Al ver este cuerpo celestial, empiezo a pensar que son todos iguales».
